schema.description: RDS SQL Server实例ID。可调用DescribeDBInstances获取。
备份上云任务的ID，可以通过DescribeMigrateTasks接口查询。

400.errorMessage: Migrate task type Incremental is not supported, only support FULL backup migrate task.
Current DB instance type does not support this operation.
Specified MigrateTaskId could not be found on RDS.
Current task status (Terminated/Failed) does not support.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

title: 终止迁移任务
summary: 该接口用于终止进行中的RDS SQL Server的备份上云任务。
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS SQL Server
